data.title: Mqf lock down quiz_march30
data.meta_description: Mqf lock down quiz_march30 - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. MQF LockDown quiz By Ramesh Babu

2. 1. Multiple definitions of X. Identify X ? ● X when used as verb means - Reserve / Make an official note of the personal details of a person. ● Another long definition of X goes like this “Instrument that record, analyse, summarise, organise, debate and explain information that are illustrative, non illustrative,hard bound paper bag jacketed, non jacketed, with forward introduction table of contents, index that are intended for the enlightenment, understanding, enrichment, enhancement and education of the human brain through sensory route of vision... some times touched" 1 Point

4. 3. Connect (Not an exhaustive list) 1. From Emperor to Citizen: The Autobiography of Aisin-Gioro Pu Yi 2. Schindler’s Ark 3. Midnight Cowboy 4. All the King’s Men 5. Q & A 1 Point

5. 4. Unique connect Song used in Wonder boys “ Things have changed” 1 Point

6. 5. Identify the person ● Perhaps taking the meaning of "high in the sky" to another level, X secretly (then not-so-secretly) advocated that marijuana use was beneficial. In an essay he authored in 1969 at age 35 under the name "Mr. X," outlined marijuana's positive effects on his sensibilities. Marijuana, wrote X, made music, art, food and sex better ● Once critic described X as a scientific Robert Redford 1 Point

7. 6. Connect 1 Point

8. 7. Id the author The book is presented as a series of discussions, over a span of four days, among two philosophers and a layman. This book was placed in “Index of Forbidden Books” 1 Point

9. 8. Identify X The first book by X was written as the result of a challenge from X's sister Madge. X has created 2 equally famous and loved characters. Both those characters appear in different books. X’s house was named Styles in 1924 after the success of X's first novel. 1 Point

10. 9. Identify X, Y. Bonus points for Z - real name of X X developed Y trilogy as a Twilight fanfiction series originally titled “Master of the Universe” and was published under fan-fiction website under the pen name "Snow Queen"s Icedragon". The piece featured characters named after Stephenie Meyer's characters in Twilight, Edward Cullen and Bella Swan. After comments concerning the sexual nature of the material, X removed the story from the fan-fiction websites and published it on X's own website. 3 Points

11. 10. Identify X and Y (his first book). In 1974 X was a casualty of a fraudulent investment scheme involving a Canadian company called Aquablast. The debacle lost him his first fortune and left him almost £500,000 in debt. Fearing imminent bankruptcy, he stood down as an MP at the October 1974 general election. X wrote his first book "Y" in the autumn of 1974, as a means of avoiding bankruptcy.His literary career picked up and he got world wide fame as an author. When X was in college, he had raised money for the charity Oxfam, obtaining the support of The Beatles in a charity fundraising drive. Not on stage but during a discussion with a college student Ringo Starr said following words about X 'He strikes me as a nice enough fella, but he's the kind of bloke who would bottle your piss and sell it". 2 Points
